1565750.name: SAELIG Demo
1565750.description:
Try SAELIG risk free and at your own pace.

You can play on a single map and you have 16 days of gameplay, which equals 16 seasons and 8 years (ending in 888 AD). Once the demo ends, feel free to start another or if you love it enough, purchase the full game to continue from your demo save. There are lots of ways to play and lots to experience so feel free to start over with a new strategy or play style as many times as you like.
